Minimum value of values in memory

Brainfuck is a language consisting of only 8 characters 

 Memory is in the form of an array of integers 

 Single characters can be input, and are then converted to their ASCII values 
 Output values are converted back to characters using their ASCII values 
 The only other piece of data is the pointer, which refers to the position in the array 

 The command characters are as follows 
 > Increment the pointer 
 < Decrement the pointer 
 + Increment the value at the pointer position in the array 
 - Decrement the value at the pointer position in the array 
 . Output the value at the pointer position in the array 
 , Accept an input character, and store it at the pointer position in the array 
 [ If the value at the pointer position in the array is zero, then move the pointer forward to the position after the matching ] command 
 ] If the value at the pointer position in the array is nonzero, then move the pointer to the matching ] command


 This app also includes a 9th character 
 \ The backslash is used to pause the program, allowing it to be debugged
